com.duowan.mobile.netroid
Interface RetryPolicy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRetryPolicy
public interface RetryPolicy

Retry policy for a request.

Method Summary
 int getCurrentRetryCount()
          Returns the current retry count (used for logging).
 int getCurrentTimeout()
          Returns the current timeout (used for logging).

          Prepares for the next retry by applying a backoff to the timeout.

int getCurrentRetryCount()
Returns the current retry count (used for logging).

retry

void retry(NetroidError error)
           throws NetroidError
Prepares for the next retry by applying a backoff to the timeout.

Parameters:
error - The error code of the last attempt.
Throws:
NetroidError - In the event that the retry could not be performed (for example if we ran out of attempts), the passed in error is thrown.
